title: Len Saldua
author: Len Saldua
content: Mine is Optimism. 55.5 %   Jumped all the way to 4th place in my top holdings.

comments.author: Len Saldua
comments.body: I guess a lot of people around here were shorting the market...

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Helium.  Has almost doubled back to $3 this month.  Dipped all the way down to around $1.60.  Good to see a lot of prices on the move.  Long term I don't this this lasting but in the short term definitely money to be made here.  Hopefully bitcoin can sustain over $20k would be good for alt prices.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Sol made 2x for me in 2 weeks. Sadly my investment on it was very conservative in size and gains on total were more like pocket money. I miss the days making 100x or more with random micro caps. But i guess my luck on finding those has ran out. When there are like 100 scams per day i do have more skepticism on what comes to investing on new small cap tokens or coins.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: My biggest gainers were also the coins that I am mining,of course when a coin is mineable and is being mined by many people there are a lot of fluctuations but since the increase in price of Bitcoin to over 21.000 at a certain point it also increased all coins,and personally for me Zilliqa got an 24% increase and near the same amount of percentage increase got also EtherereumPoW,these coins I am dual mining them and I love the ability to get "free" Zilliqa coins by dual mining,they are just an added bonus.For other alts I only have Litecoin and Shiba Inu which also both got a nice increase in value.I don't have any other alts right now,well I have FUN tokens but that stays stable and did not move much.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Quote from: Len Saldua on January 15, 2023, 10:44:34 AMI guess a lot of people around here were shorting the market... Nope, not me. I'm still holding and still applying the lesson I've learned for the past years in the market.Quote from: Len Saldua on January 14, 2023, 05:53:27 PMMine is Optimism. 55.5 %   Jumped all the way to 4th place in my top holdings.Good for you, is that the one that came from the airdrop? Mine, none other than bitcoin. So, calculate how much the percentage on it and I only look at the price of it.So basically, from $16k up to $20,800.  That's a great gain for me so far within less than a month.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: Len Saldua on January 14, 2023, 05:53:27 PMMine is Optimism. 55.5 %   Jumped all the way to 4th place in my top holdings.You can refer here, "trending coins" at Coinsmarketcap.The leading crypto that has gained bigger was Taboo token, Solana, and Bitcoin but I still prefer holding Bitcoin which is I think not shorting the market.  We know that all are pumping in the market since Bitcoin was pumping, everything followed by the Bitcoin trend. That's good for you, you've risked your portfolio by choosing short-term coins which is I don't think the right decision IMO.Good luck everyone, let's not dump the market with this small recovery of Bitcoin.

comments.author: Psynthax
comments.body: Almost all of mytokens were going up. I have been holding so many tokens like aptos, decentraland, gala, mana, pyr and many more. Gala has been spiking up a few hundreds percents from its bottom while MANA was also performing so well. That's very good to see that if bitcoin will able to break 40k in the future. I have been stacking up so many altcoins. Only stupid people will be mising the golden chance to make bunch of money like that. Im currently sitting with decent profit in my portfolios now.

comments.author: big kid
comments.body: Mine is Bitcoin. I don't have many coins in my portfolio, and BTC is the biggest asset I own. So that suits fine for me.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Bitcoin. I only had like BTC, ETH, as my main portfolio, the rest were leftovers from when I tried them out (like AXS, which grew, but since I had peanuts on it well, it wasn't really that much). I have a bit of my portfolio for TRX and MATIC as well, but they didn't really grow as big as Bitcoin so far. I might actually just let them go right now while I'm in the profit, pretty afraid of shorting so I don't think I'd really get any bigger gains than what BTC or ETH has to offer (the only ones I'm holding for the long term).

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Among my holding Bitcoin is topping the lead.. I bought few at 16,700 and others at 17,000 seeing it at 20k makes me a gainer already. Although I have small pieces of Matic which appreciated more than btc but base on my holding I made more profit from BTC.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: I had big gains with Solana (unexpected) next is with BTC wherein I had some as well. Basically these are the tokens in my wallet and I was really planning to hold them for a while but a sudden increase took place recently. However I sold them upon crossing the barriers simply because I'm in doubt of a continuous increase as early as the present. The year has just started and Spikes are more likely to occur than bullish trend in my opinion, especially from being bearish for a couple of months. Recovery won't be that easy because there is now a huge gap between current market prices and ATH market value among cryptocurrencies. Would probably be spotting more coins for the purpose of earning profit if spikes again occur.

comments.author: AakZaki
comments.body: In the last 7 days the biggest gains I got from Bitcoin 20%, Ethereum 17% and Solana 42%, those are some of the coins I've been holding since the last bearish and until the market recovered. Some of them are for the long term and are taking a little advantage of solana's rising prices. Currently, altcoins are recovering because the price of Bitcoin has started to strengthen and has managed to penetrate the price of $20k. If it remains stable and tends to rise, the altcoins will have a party.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Except for BNB, I don't have many altcoins. However, it does not appear to have gained much when compared to others. So far, Bitcoin has performed well, but not BNB. I chose BNB because, even when the market crashes, it does not crash hard. That is most likely why it does not pump as hard as it should. I hope it becomes profitable soon.

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: I think everyone holding btc has gotten quite the gain lately mainly because BTC was going up quite good enough, even though it seems most alts in general didn't really get that much of an increase.moreover this trend could be well be continued further. Investing in BTC always certainly gives the advantage of being the first to be bullish, but surely everyone that invested in ETH also have the same benefits.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on January 16, 2023, 11:21:11 AMAmong my holding Bitcoin is topping the lead.. I bought few at 16,700 and others at 17,000 seeing it at 20k makes me a gainer already. Although I have small pieces of Matic which appreciated more than btc but base on my holding I made more profit from BTC. That's also my biggest gainer for this uptrend. And good for you that you bought it when it was $16k-$17k while it's now up and green. My next good gainer is ETH.It's visible in how much it has gained and as the typical thing to the market whenever the father of them all has been rising, they're also going to increase in price and that's the trend that many altcoins do follow.Very noticeable that most of us have gained and bought when they were quite lower and hope that this trend continues up to the next years to come. I'm always expecting that there could be some dips and lows but they won't be that painful anymore.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Quote from: Len Saldua on January 14, 2023, 05:53:27 PMMine is Optimism. 55.5 %   Jumped all the way to 4th place in my top holdings.Mine was Solana, Solana went really hard to dump after the issue of FTX Exchange. And when Bitcoin started to pump up to above $20,000 a few days ago, Solana is one of the huge gainers. If you take a look at the list of top gainers for the last 7 days, most of the altcoins here are smart contract platforms like Solana/Optimism/Avalanche and together with NFT platforms like just Decentraland, The Sandbox, and Flow.
